high_descs: turn right, walk towards the door, turn left to face the bed
close the computer that is on the bed, pick it up
turn around, walk towards mirror, turn right to face the lamp
anns.task_desc: examine the computer with the lamp

high_descs: Turn to the right then turn to the left to face the bed.
Shut the lap top and pick it up from the bed.
Turn around completely and walk forward to the lamp on the dresser.
Use the lap top to turn on the lamp.
anns.task_desc: Turn on a lamp with a lap top.

high_descs: Walk to the right of the bed to face the laptop.
Close and pick up the laptop closest to the edge of the bed.
Turn around and walk towards the mirror to face the lamp on the right of it.
anns.task_desc: Pick up a laptop on the bed to turn on a lamp.
